bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: PC, presumably a writing error of bian du 便毒 , poison [in the region] of relief. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry she gan 射干 quoting Ben cao yan yi bu yi 本草衍義補遺 : 行太陰、厥陰之積痰，使結 核自消，甚捷，又治便毒 , “It moves phlegm accumulations in the major yin and ceasing yin [regions], causes node kernels to dissolve by themselves, and is very fast [in its effects]. It also cures poison [in the region] of relief”, writes: 利 積痰疝毒，消結核 , “It is beneficial [in curing] phlegm accumulations and ele vation-illness with poison , and dissolves node kernels”.
